sent.orig: "Bless them, bless them! Long shall we bless them! [The] Ring-bearers, praise [them] to the height!"
sent.trans: 赞美他们，赞美他们！让我们长久地赞美他们！致以持戒者最崇高的赞美！

sent.orig: We might as well learn them, accommodate them, utilize them and be grateful for them.
sent.trans: 我们也可以学习他们，适应他们，利用他们，感激他们。

sent.orig: Or you can broil them, peach them, barbecue them, and even braise them.
sent.trans: 或是烘焙，水煮，烧烤，甚至可以炖煮。

sent.orig: They brought them back to their homelands and fused them with their cuisines, making them famous.
sent.trans: 他们把这些调料带回自己的国家，融入他们本身的烹饪法，使之发扬光大。

sent.orig: They decided to help and established communications with them, and told them they would assist them.
sent.trans: 会议决定接触并帮助“GDI”，并将此消息告知“GDI”。
